Get to Know me.

Sales Marketer

As a Sales marketer I sell goods, services or products to consumers and retail clients. I also work in a variety of environments.
My duties are understanding what customers or clients are looking for and liaising with them in order to provide sales-based solutions to their problems or needs.
Striving to reach established sales targets by explaining and demonstrating the benefits of certain products and services to clients and customers.
Processing payments, issuing receipts, maintaining records of orders, and providing exceptional customer service by following up with clients after a purchase has been completed.
I am responsible for improving the public relations of the company by constantly communicating the companys' product policy with the customers, in order to generate hype in the market.
I have a culturally active brain, which is important to understand the background of the customers they are catering to.

I generally incorporate all aspects of marketing, from the identification of consumer markets to communication, all activities can make huge profits.

GBV Advocate

Today across the globe, violence, oppression and discrimination prevent millions from living up to their God-given potential ,Harmful traditional beliefs about the role of girls and women, tribal and ethnic divisions, and cultural stigmas that marginalize the disabled, widowed, or abused, strip many from the fullness of life they deserve.But today, I change that.Gender-based violence is one of the most prevalent human rights violations in the world. It knows no social, economic or national boundaries. I impacts women and girls in different ways,when a woman has been subjected to gender-based violence, she has short and long-term consequences for her physical, mental and sexual and reproductive health.

Injuries, unintended pregnancies, sexually transmitted infections and gynaecological disorders, as well as anxiety, depression, post-traumatic stress disorder and even self-harm. For example, survivors of intimate partner violence have a twofold increased risk of undergoing an induced abortion, and are 50 per cent more likely to have a sexually transmitted infection or HIV. Gender-based violence is not only a violation of individual womens' ,mens' and girls' rights. The impunity enjoyed by perpetrators, and the fear generated by their actions, has an effect on all women ,men and girls. It also takes a toll on a global level, stunting the contributions women,men and girls can make to international development, peace and progress.

We should come together and stop gender based violence!
